Title: Nend nahi aane denge
Author: Dhruv
Description: React Router is a popular routing library for React applications. It provides a declarative API for routing, making it easy to navigate between pages and handle URL changes. In version 6 of React Router, a new hook called useNavigate was introduced to replace the useHistory and useLocation hooks. In this article, we'll explore how to use the useNavigate hook to navigate between pages in your React application
